subject: Sexual Health
title: Harm Reduction Strategies
description: A 60-second lesson on Harm Reduction Strategies.

hook.text: Perfect prevention is rare. Harm reduction focuses on lowering risk rather than demanding perfection.

buildup.text: Strategies include using condoms, limiting partners, avoiding substances that impair judgment.

discovery.text: Combining multiple strategies layers protection, reducing overall risk far more than any single method.

twist.text: Abstinence-only education has consistently failed to reduce STI rates in studies across many countries.

climax.text: Realistic harm reduction saves more lives than idealistic approaches that ignore human behavior.

quiz.question: Why is combining prevention methods effective?
options: Layered protection reduces overall risk more
